captions.text:
[ Girl's Voice ]
Seeing him smile
would make me so happy.

Organization and management
is what l need.

l need a system.
Something concrete.

Let all prayers
be organized into files.

Well, that takes care
ofthe voices.

Not exactly
a space saver though.

Okay, l need something
with a lock, security,
combination, a password.

We bless. No mess.
Downloading now.

This is gonna
take a while.

Disfrute un buen café.
Gracias, se\code(0144)or.

Ah! Now, that's fresh
mountain-grown coffee
from the hills ofColombia.

Okay, l had to have made
some kind ofa dent by now.

What a bunch ofwhiners.
This is gonna suck up
my whole life.

title: Bruce Almighty (7/9) Movie CLIP - Bruce Answers Prayers (2003) HD

comments.author: moonsmonsters

comments.text:
I was JUST thinking that; vengeance would be shot down, but MIGHT (and 
that's a BIG might) be given a second look IF the offended party has a DAMN 
good reason to be angry. Zealots would have the rug torn out from under 
them, but loving family members hoping that their kin find faith, or 
overcome their demons would be seriously considered. Prayers based in 
outright greed would be ignored, but those with need would be listened to. 
Prayers of children would top the list, as when it comes to prayers from 
the heart, they have an instinct for such a thing.

...just saying. Didn't mean to ramble.
